intents.name: Tariff Changes
intents.description: Provides analysis and updates on changes in tariffs and their impact on trade.
examples: What are the recent changes in tariffs for imports from China?
How will the new trade agreement affect tariffs?
Can you update me on the latest tariff changes in the EU?

name: GeoPolitical Sentinel Analysis
scope: Analyzes geopolitical factors affecting trade, including changes in tariffs and trade agreements.
